title: Ticket #578: condor_* tools missing several subsystems to perform actions on
description:
condor_restart/reconfig and other tools won't act upon a number of subsystems that I would expect to be allowed. The ones I've found are:

DBMSD Job_Router HAD Replication

There may be more. If one of the above subsystems is given with the -subsystem option, the following error is printed:

Can't connect to unknown daemon
